short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Closes the oldest open tabs if the total number exceeds a user-specified limit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension to Limit Number of Open Tabs

We are all guilty of opening too many tabs while browsing, which can lead to overwhelming clutter and reduced productivity. This Chrome extension helps manage your open tabs by setting a limit on how many you can have open at once. When the limit is reached, the extension will either prompt you to close a tab before opening a new one, or it can automatically close the least recently used tab, depending on your preferences. Stay focused, keep your browser tidy, and reduce system strain with this simple yet powerful tab management tool.

Key features include:

Customizable tab limit
Automatic tab closing or user prompts
Easy-to-use interface
Helps improve focus and browser performance
Take control of your browsing habits and declutter your digital workspace!
